outputs.output_descr:
The aim of this project  is to enable and encourage the refrigeration service sector to undertake retrofits of refrigeration and air-conditioning equipment to emply Hydro Chlo-Flouro Carbon (HCFC) and Hydro Flouro Carbon (HFC) to refrigerants and a Mobile Air-Conditioning.  The outputs associated with the project are:-
Output 1. Information dissemination.
Output 2. Training in Refrigerant and air conditioning retrofitting
Output 3. Training in Mobile Air-Conditioning servicing and retrofitting
Output 4.  Training in Mobile Air-Conditioning recovery and recycling
Output 5.  Equipping of participating Mobile Air-Conditioning service centres
Output 6.  Equipping of the refrigeration department of the Samuel Jackman Prescod Polytechnic
Output 7.  Mobile Air-Conditioning recovery and recyling programme
Output 8.  Monitoring activities.
t

project_descr: IMPLEMENTATION OF THE REFIGERANT MANAGEMENT PLAN:   TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE PROJECT TO THE MAC AND END USERS SECTORS
